mapper.select: select p.pf_no, p.businessNum, p.pf_title, p.pf_type, p.pf_subtype, p.pf_range, p.pf_zipcode, p.pf_addr1, p.pf_addr2, p.pf_addr3, p.pf_area, p.pf_cost, p.pf_period, p.pf_concept, p.pf_introduction, p.pf_closing, p.pf_photo1, p.pf_photo2, p.pf_photo3, p.pf_photo4, p.pf_photo5, p.pf_premium, p.pf_regdate, pt.businessName from portfolioT p JOIN partnersT pT on pT.businessNum = p.businessNum order by p.pf_no desc
select * from partnersT where businessNum = (select businessNum from portfolioT where pf_no = #{pf_no})
mapper.insert: insert into portfolioT (pf_no, businessNum, pf_title, pf_type, pf_subtype, pf_range, pf_zipcode, pf_addr1, pf_addr2, pf_addr3, pf_area, pf_cost, pf_period, pf_concept, pf_introduction, pf_closing, pf_regdate) values (portfolioT_no_seq.nextval, #{businessNum}, #{pf_title}, #{pf_type}, #{pf_subtype}, #{pf_range}, #{pf_zipcode}, #{pf_addr1}, #{pf_addr2}, #{pf_addr3}, #{pf_area}, #{pf_cost}, #{pf_period}, #{pf_concept}, #{pf_introduction}, #{pf_closing}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select pf_no from portfolioT where businessNum=#{businessNum} and pf_title=#{pf_title}
mapper.insert: update portfolioT set pf_photo1=#{pf_photo1 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pf_photo2=#{pf_photo2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pf_photo3=#{pf_photo3 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pf_photo4=#{pf_photo4 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pf_photo5=#{pf_photo5 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pf_no=#{pf_no}
